author: Special Correspondent
text:
The uncontrolled rash driving by one of the private bus drivers here has killed a youth, who had come to Tirunelveli Medical College Hospital (TVMCH) for treatment.

Police said S. Muthumari (24) of Rameswaram, who had larynx-related problem, had been undergoing treatment at the TVMCH for the past two weeks.

When he came out of the hospital on Thursday afternoon, a speeding bus knocked him down. He died on the spot.

Traders who happened to see the accident said that rash driving of the driver of a private bus was the reason for it.

“When the private bus driver tried to overtake another bus at high speed, he knocked down the victim,” a shopkeeper who was witness to the accident, said.

Case registered

Traffic Investigation Wing police have registered a case.
title: Speeding bus knocks youth dead
